long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now, you can bookmark music you find online and easily categorize in one click. You can then listen to it in a single universal playlist independent of where you found it! 

Supports links from Bandcamp, YouTube, Soundcloud, Discogs, Spotify, Apple Music & more.

Features 

- Search & select the crate or playlist to save your new music 
- Add tags to easily categorize new music under smart crates (e.g. a tune tagged “UKG will appear under “UKG” smart crate)
- Automatically detect tags when supported (there is a setting to turn this on or off)

Save music in 2 different ways: 
- Click the Crates button in the toolbar 
- Right-click a link and select “Save to Crates” 

Your saves, are stored directly in your own Crates Server, and not shared with Crates service, Crates website, any third party or other entity.

Please note that Crates (Server) app must be running on your computer, in order for the extension to work.
